description: Create beautiful, interactive sales documents and proposals with Qwilr. Automate page creation, track views, and handle acceptance events.

actions.name: create_page
actions.description: Creates a new Qwilr page from saved blocks or template.

triggers.name: page_accepted
triggers.description: Triggers when a Qwilr page is accepted

triggers.name: page_first_viewed
triggers.description: Triggers when a Qwilr page is viewed for the first time

triggers.name: page_partially_accepted
triggers.description: Triggers when a Qwilr page is partially accepted

triggers.name: page_preview_accepted
triggers.description: Triggers when a Qwilr page preview is accepted

triggers.name: page_revived_live
triggers.description: Triggers when a Qwilr page is revived to live status

triggers.name: page_set_live
triggers.description: Triggers when a Qwilr page is set to live

triggers.name: page_viewed
triggers.description: Triggers when a Qwilr page is viewed
